scripts.cms:local: echo 'Switching to LOCAL development mode...' && ./switch-cms-mode.sh local
scripts.cms:live: echo 'Switching to LIVE production mode...' && ./switch-cms-mode.sh live
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting Jekyll server... Open another terminal and run: npm run dev:cms' && npm run dev:jekyll
scripts.commit:safe: npm run cms:live && git add admin/config.yml && git commit
scripts.commit:and-back: npm run cms:live && git add admin/config.yml && git commit && npm run cms:local
